data.name: SpiritBelowTheWaves
data.detailed_description:
WONDER, FEAR, HAPPINESS, SADNESS and the THRILL of DISCOVERY

For fans of Journey, The Stanly Pairable, and Hollow Knight.
Follow an emotional, intimate story by the character you play with an ending that will twist your mind. Experience a roller coaster of emotions in this new unexplored world.

Explore the deep ocean a creative, beautiful world awaits. Unravel an amazing story about the player at your hand.


Drive a Submarine through the depths of the ocean unlock new abilities and discover puzzles, bosses merged in with the story the player is telling you along your journey.
A short game (about an hour and a half) focused on story, Meet new CHARACTERS and ENEMIES sometimes in life you will have to fight for survival and for what's really yours. Do not give up on this story.


But the thing about stories is not all stories have happy endings.

data.short_description: EXPLORE, SURVIVE the deep ocean a beautiful new world awaits. Unravel an amazing story about the player at your hand. Experience a roller coaster of emotions in this new unexplored world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
